name: Archbishops of Alexandria Athanasius (373) and Cyril (444)
kontakia: (Tone 4) O greatest holy leaders of piousness* and valiant warriors of the Church of Christ,* keep al those who sing*: "Save, O Good One, those who worship You!"

(Tone 2) Having planted orthodox doctrines,* you cut down the weeds of heterodoxy,* multiplying the seed of the faith by the rain of the Spirit, O venerable one.* Therefore we sing of you, Athanasius.
